parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of control, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when driving at high speeds or towing heavy loads.
symptoms: Sudden and violent shaking of the steering wheel
loss of steering control
pulling to one side
and difficulty turning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed or Unavailable Recall Repairs (Steering Recall)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay or unavailability of recall repairs can lead to continued risk of accidents or near-misses due to steering system failures.
symptoms: Notification of recall
but parts are not available
or repairs are delayed
causing concern for safety and continued risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the serpentine belt to fracture, leading to loss of power steering and difficulty stopping the vehicle, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Fractured serpentine belt
loss of power steering
and difficulty stopping the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Kinked Power Steering Line Causing Loss of Braking Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A kinked power steering line can cause a loss of braking power, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially in situations where immediate stopping is required.
symptoms: The brake pedal becomes hard to press
resulting in a loss of braking power
the vehicle is unable to stop or slow down
the brake pedal feels spongy or soft.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause a loss of braking power, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially in situations where immediate stopping is required.
symptoms: The brake pedal does not respond or feels soft
the brake pedal is difficult to press
the vehicle is unable to stop or slow down.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed Recall Repair: Unavailability of Parts
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of parts for recall repairs can leave vehicles in an unsafe condition, potentially causing accidents or injuries, and can also lead to frustration and inconvenience for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Dealership claims parts are on back-order
recall repair is delayed
vehicle owner is unable to get the necessary repair
vehicle remains in an unsafe condition.
